      • setDisposeWhenEmpty

        public void setDisposeWhenEmpty​(boolean disposeWhenEmpty)
        This function sets a boolean value for whether an object should be disposed when it is empty.
        Parameters:
        disposeWhenEmpty - disposeWhenEmpty is a boolean parameter that determines whether this manager should be disposed of when it becomes empty. If set to true, the object will be disposed of when it becomes empty. If set to false, the object will not be disposed of when it becomes empty.
